name: time_zone_api
description: Fetches up-to-date time zone and local time information as JSON based on a given query parameter.

q.description: Query parameter to fetch time zone data.

name: availability
description: Checks if a given URL is archived and currently accessible in the Wayback Machine.

url.description: The URL to check for availability in the Wayback Machine.

timestamp.description: The timestamp to look up in Wayback. If not specified, the most recent available capture is returned. The format of the timestamp is 1-14 digits (YYYYMMDDhhmmss). Defaults to '20090101'.

callback.description: An optional callback to produce a JSONP response. Defaults to None.

name: get_individual_news_from_source
description: Fetch LGBTQ+ related news from a specific newspaper using the newspaper's ID.

newspaperid.description: The unique identifier of the newspaper from which to retrieve news.

name: getforecastweather
description: Fetches weather forecast data for a specified city using the OpenWeatherMap API.

q.description: The city name for which the weather forecast is requested.

cnt.description: The number of timestamps to return in the response. Defaults to None.

units.description: Units of measurement. Options are 'imperial' for Fahrenheit, 'metric' for Celsius, and 'standard' for Kelvin. Defaults to 'standard'.

lang.description: Language for the output. Translation applies to city name and description fields. Defaults to None.

name: get_weather_updates
description: Fetches weather updates for a given city using the RapidAPI Weather API.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve weather information.

name: now
description: Fetches the current time for a specified time zone using the RapidAPI date calculator service.

tzname.description: The name of the time zone for which to fetch the current time. Defaults to 'UTC'.

name: get_hourly_forecast
description: Retrieves the hourly weather forecast for a specified city using the RapidAPI Cloud Cast service.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the hourly weather forecast.

name: weather_report
description: Fetches the weather report of a specified city using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

cityname.description: Name of the city for which the weather report is to be fetched.

name: reverse_geocoding
description: Translates location coordinates into human-readable addresses using the Reverse Geocoding API.

query.description: The location coordinates to be translated into a readable address.

name: alerts_active_zone_zoneid
description: Fetches a list of active weather alerts for a specified zone ID using the National Weather Service API.

zoneid.description: A valid zone ID for which to fetch the active alerts. Example: 'ILZ081'.

name: daily_forecast_5_days
description: Fetch a 5-day daily weather forecast for the specified geographic coordinates.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location for which the forecast is to be retrieved.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location for which the forecast is to be retrieved.

name: ski_weather_api
description: Fetches ski weather forecasts from the World Weather Online API for a specified location.

q.description: The location query (e.g., city name, latitude/longitude).

tp.description: Time period for the weather forecast (e.g., '3 hourly'). Default is None.

lang.description: The language code for the weather forecast (default is 'en' for English).

format.description: The response format, such as 'json' or 'xml'. Default is None.

num_of_days.description: The number of days for the weather forecast, with a maximum of 7 days. Default is 1.

name: get_station_information
description: Get information about a NOAA tide station using its ID.

is_id.description: The station ID to retrieve information for.

name: current
description: Fetch the current weather information for a specified location using the Foreca Weather API.

location.description: The location for which the current weather is to be retrieved.

windunit.description: The unit for wind speed in the response. Default is 'MS'.

alt.description: The altitude in meters. Default is 0.

lang.description: The language for the response, specified using ISO 639-1 codes. Default is 'en'.

tz.description: The time zone for the response, specified using IANA time zone database names. Default is 'Europe/London'.

tempunit.description: The unit for temperature in the response. Default is 'C'.

name: xyz_map_tiles_for_ocean_conditions
description: Fetches ocean condition tiles based on the specified variable and datetime using Wavebase API.

variable.description: The ocean variable to fetch (e.g., 'VHM0' for wave significant height).

datetime.description: The datetime for the desired observation, in the format 'YYYYMMDDHH'.

name: air_quality_forecast
description: Returns an air quality forecast for a given location.

lat.description: The latitude of the location for which the air quality forecast is to be retrieved.

lon.description: The longitude of the location for which the air quality forecast is to be retrieved.

hours.description: The number of hours for which the forecast is to be retrieved (default is 72).

name: weather_statistics
description: Fetches the average weather statistics for a specified location for the next 30 days.

units.description: Unit system to be used. Available values are:

place_id.description: Identifier of a place. If not provided, the location can be specified using `lat` and `lon`.

lon.description: Longitude in the format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4. Defaults to '-122.42282'.

lat.description: Latitude in the format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4. Defaults to '37.81021'.

name: by_geographic_coordinates
description: Fetches weather data based on geographic coordinates.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinates.

units.description: Units of measurement. Options are 'standard', 'metric', and 'imperial'. Defaults to 'standard' if not specified.

lang.description: Language for the output. Defaults to the API's default language if not specified.

name: search_autocomplete_api
description: Search or Autocomplete API returns matching cities and towns based on the query.

q.description: Query parameter used to obtain matching locations. Supported formats include:

name: ip_lookup_api
description: Fetches detailed information for a given IP address using the WeatherAPI.

q.description: The IP address to look up. Can also be 'auto:ip' to auto-detect the IP address.

name: hourly_forecast
description: Fetches the hourly weather forecast for a specified ski resort.

resort.description: The name of the ski resort for which the forecast is to be fetched.

el.description: Specifies a part of the mountain. Accepted values are 'top', 'mid', and 'bot'. Default is 'top'.

units.description: Specifies desired units. Accepted values are 'i' (imperial) and 'm' (metric). Default is 'i'.

c.description: Limits the result to the current day only. Default is None.

name: nowcast
description: Fetches a 3-hour weather forecast in 15-minute time steps for a given location.

location.description: The geographic location for which the forecast is requested.

dataset.description: The set of weather variables to include in the response (default is 'full').

windunit.description: The unit for wind speed in the response, such as 'MS' (meters per second) (default is 'MS').

tz.description: The time zone for the response, using IANA time zone database names (default is 'Europe/London').

tempunit.description: The unit for temperature in the response, such as 'C' (Celsius) (default is 'C').

alt.description: The altitude of the location in meters (default is 0).

periods.description: The number of 15-minute time steps to include, with a maximum of 12 (default is 8).

name: local_weather_api
description: Fetches local weather data using the World Weather Online API.

q.description: Location query (city name, town name, or geographic coordinates).

tp.description: Time interval between weather updates (e.g., '1' for hourly updates). Defaults to None.

aqi.description: Whether to include Air Quality Index data ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to 'yes'.

format.description: Response format (e.g., 'json' or 'xml'). Defaults to None.

lang.description: Language for the output. Defaults to 'en'.

alerts.description: Whether to include weather alerts ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to 'no'.

num_of_days.description: Number of days for the weather forecast. Defaults to 3.

name: get_current_weather
description: Retrieves the current weather for a specified city using the Cloud Cast API.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the weather.

name: air_quality_history
description: Fetches the past 24 hours of air quality observations for a specified geographic location.

lat.description: Latitude of the location for which to retrieve air quality data.

lon.description: Longitude of the location for which to retrieve air quality data.

name: get_wind_speed
description: Fetches the current wind speed for a specified city using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve wind speed information.

name: current_air_quality
description: Fetches the current air quality conditions for a given location specified by its longitude and latitude.

lon.description: Longitude of the location for which to retrieve air quality data.

lat.description: Latitude of the location for which to retrieve air quality data.

name: v1_airquality
description: Fetches air quality data from the API Ninjas Air Quality API based on provided location parameters.

zip.description: ZIP code of the desired location.

city.description: Name of the city. Defaults to 'Seattle'.

lon.description: Longitude of the desired location. Must be used in conjunction with `lat`.

lat.description: Latitude of the desired location. Must be used in conjunction with `lon`.

name: daily
description: Fetches the daily weather forecast for the next 21 days using Meteosource's AI technology.

language.description: The language of text summaries. Available options are:

units.description: The unit system for the forecast data. Available options are:

lon.description: Longitude in various formats like 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4. Alternatively, use the `place_id` parameter. Defaults to '-122.42282'.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place obtained from Location endpoints. Alternatively, use `lat` and `lon` parameters. Defaults to None.

lat.description: Latitude in various formats like 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4. Alternatively, use the `place_id` parameter. Defaults to '37.81021'.

name: nearest_place
description: Searches for the nearest named place (village, town, or city) from given GPS coordinates.

lat.description: Latitude in formats like "12N", "12.3N", "12.3", "13S", "13.2S", or "-13.4".

language.description: The language for the place names. Available options are:

name: rapidapigethourlyforecastbylocationname
description: Fetches the hourly weather forecast for a given location using the RapidAPI service.

locationname.description: The name of the location for which to retrieve the hourly weather forecast.

name: rapidapigetforecasthourlybycoordinates
description: Gets hourly weather forecast information for given geographical coordinates using the RapidAPI service.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location.

name: get_5_day_3_hour_forecast_data
description: Fetches the 5-day weather forecast data with 3-hour intervals for a specified location.

q.description: The location query in the format "{city name},{country code}". The city name and country code should be divided by a comma, and the country code should follow ISO 3166 standards. Defaults to 'dallas,us'.

name: hourly_forecast_48_hours
description: Fetches a 48-hour weather forecast for the specified latitude and longitude coordinates.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for the forecast location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for the forecast location.

name: air_quality_forecasts
description: Fetches hourly air quality forecast for a specified city.

country.description: The country where the city is located.

city.description: The city for which the air quality forecast is required.

lat.description: Latitude of the city. Defaults to '52.377956'.

lon.description: Longitude of the city. Defaults to '4.897070'.

name: alerts_parameters
description: Fetches a list of weather alerts from the National Weather Service API, with optional filtering parameters.

active.description: Active alerts indicator (1 for active, 0 for inactive).

zone.description: Zone ID for forecast or county.

urgency.description: Urgency of the alert (e.g., expected, immediate).

certainty.description: Certainty of the event (e.g., likely, observed).

severity.description: Severity of the event (e.g., minor, moderate, severe).

name: defaultroot
description: Fetches cat facts from the MeowFacts API based on the provided parameters.

count.description: The number of cat facts to return. If not specified, a default number of facts will be returned.

factid.description: An optional ID to retrieve a specific cat fact. If not specified, random facts will be returned.

lang.description: The locale in which to retrieve the cat facts. Defaults to 'eng' (English).

name: alerts_active_region_region
description: Fetches a list of active weather alerts for a specific region from the National Weather Service API in CAP-ATOM format.

region.description: A valid region code for which to retrieve active alerts. Refer to the API documentation for a list of valid region codes.

name: realtime_weather_api
description: Fetches current weather information based on the provided query parameter.

q.description: Query parameter used to specify the location for which weather data is required. It can be in various formats such as:

name: get_forecastdata_by_lat_lon
description: Fetches a 14-day weather forecast for a given location specified by latitude and longitude.

lat.description: Latitude of the location.

lang.description: Language for the forecast data. Defaults to 'en'. It can be one of [en, de, nl, fr, pl, gr, it, cn, ru, cz, pt, es].

name: location_info
description: Retrieve metadata for a specified location using the Foreca Weather API.

location.description: The location for which to retrieve metadata.

name: forecast_weather_api
description: Fetches weather forecast and alerts from a weather API.

q.description: Query parameter to specify the location. It can be:

days.description: Number of days of weather forecast required, with a default of 3 days.

dt.description: Specific date for the forecast in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format. Must be between today and the next 10 days.

lang.description: Desired language for the 'condition:text' field in the response.

name: getweatherforecast
description: Fetches the weather forecast for a given location over a specified number of days.

location.description: The name of the city or location for which to retrieve the weather forecast.

days.description: The number of days of forecast data to retrieve. Defaults to 3. The range of days is from 1 to 16.

name: alerts
description: Fetches severe weather alerts for a specified location using GPS coordinates or place ID.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place obtained from the 'Location' endpoints. If provided, it takes precedence over lat and lon.

lat.description: Latitude of the location, with defaults to '45.74846'. This can be in formats like 12N, 12.3N, -13.4. Ignored if place_id is provided.

lon.description: Longitude of the location, with defaults to '4.84671'. This can be in formats like 12E, 12.3E, -13.4. Ignored if place_id is provided.

language.description: Language of text summaries. Supported languages are:

timezone.description: Timezone for date fields in the response. Default is 'auto', which uses the local timezone of the location. Format follows the tzinfo database (e.g., 'Europe/Prague', 'UTC').

name: sports_api
description: Fetches a listing of all upcoming sports events for football, cricket, and golf in JSON format using the weatherapi-com RapidAPI service.

q.description: The location query to search for sports events.

name: astronomy_api
description: Fetches astronomical data including sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon phase, and illumination in JSON format based on the provided query parameters.

q.description: The query parameter for retrieving data. It supports various formats such as:

dt.description: The date for which to retrieve the astronomical data. Defaults to None.

name: news_list
description: Fetch a list of the latest news articles based on the given performance ID.

performanceid.description: The ID used to filter news articles, obtained from endpoints like auto-complete, get-summary, or get-movers.

name: get_humidty
description: Fetches the humidity data for a specified city using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

city.description: The name of the city to get the humidity information for.

name: latest_observations
description: Fetches the latest weather observations for a given location using the Foreca Weather API.

location.description: The location for which to fetch the latest weather observations.

lang.description: The language in which the results should be returned. Defaults to 'en'.

name: v1_weather
description: Fetches weather information from the API Ninjas Weather API endpoint.

lon.description: The longitude of the desired location. Must be supplied with the `lat` parameter.

lat.description: The latitude of the desired location. Must be supplied with the `lon` parameter.

name: points_point_forecast
description: Fetches weather forecast data for a specific geographic point using the National Weather Service API.

name: by_city_name
description: Fetch weather data from the RapidWeather API by city name.

q.description: City name, state code, and country code divided by commas (e.g., "London,UK").

lang.description: Language code to get the output in a specific language.

name: three_hourly
description: Fetches a three-hourly weather forecast for a given location up to 14 days, with optional historical data and various configurable parameters.

location.description: The location for which to fetch the weather forecast.

history.description: Whether to include 24 hours of past data. Defaults to None.

tz.description: Time zone in the response, specified using IANA time zone database names. Defaults to 'Europe/London'.

dataset.description: The variable set to use in the response. Defaults to 'full'.

tempunit.description: The temperature unit in the response (e.g., 'C' for Celsius). Defaults to 'C'.

alt.description: The altitude in meters. Defaults to 0.

periods.description: The number of time steps in the response, with a default of 8 and a maximum of 12. Defaults to 8.

windunit.description: The wind speed unit in the response (e.g., 'MS' for meters per second). Defaults to 'MS'.

name: get_tides_for_a_station
description: Retrieves tide information for a specified station ID on a given date using the RapidAPI NOAA Tides service.

is_id.description: The ID of the tide station to get information for.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve tide information in YYYYMMDD format. Defaults to '20220625'.

name: zones_type_zoneid_forecast
description: Fetches the forecast data for a given zone type and zone ID using the National Weather Service API.

type.description: A valid zone type (e.g., public, coastal, fire).

zoneid.description: The ID of the zone for which to fetch the forecast.

name: historical_weather
description: Fetch historical weather data for a specific date and location within the past 8 years.

date.description: The UTC day of the data in the past in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

lat.description: Latitude in the following format: `12N`, `12.3N`, `12.3`, `13S`, `13.2S`, `-13.4`. If not provided, `place_id` must be specified. Default is '37.81021'.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place. If not provided, `lat` and `lon` must be specified. Default is None.

units.description: Unit system to be used. Available values are:

lon.description: Longitude in the following format: `12E`, `12.3E`, `12.3`, `13W`, `13.2W`, `-13.4`. If not provided, `place_id` must be specified. Default is '-122.42282'.

name: rapidapigetforecastsummarybycoordinates
description: Fetches the weather forecast summary for the given geographical coordinates using RapidAPI.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location for which to get the forecast summary.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location for which to get the forecast summary.

name: points_point
description: Fetches forecast information for a given geographical point from the National Weather Service.

point.description: Latitude and longitude in the format 'EPSG:4326 latitude, EPSG:4326 longitude'.

name: hourly
description: Fetch hourly weather forecast for a specified location over the next 5 days using AI technology.

lon.description: Longitude in formats like '12E', '12.3E', or '-13.4'. This parameter is optional if `place_id` is provided.

lat.description: Latitude in formats like '12N', '12.3N', or '-13.4'. This parameter is optional if `place_id` is provided.

language.description: Language for the text summaries. Options are 'en' (English), 'es' (Spanish), 'fr' (French), 'de' (German), 'pl' (Polish), 'cs' (Czech).

place_id.description: Identifier of a place. If provided, it overrides `lat` and `lon`.

units.description: Unit system to be used. Options are 'auto', 'metric', 'us', 'uk', 'ca'. Default is 'auto'.

timezone.description: Timezone for the date fields. Can be a tzinfo database string like 'Europe/Prague', 'UTC', or 'auto' to use the local timezone of the location. Default is 'auto'.

name: get_the_forecast
description: Fetches the weather forecast for the specified city using the RapidAPI Cloud Cast service.

city.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the weather forecast.

name: ocean_conditions_closest_to_latitude_longitude
description: Search for current and predicted ocean conditions closest to a specified latitude and longitude.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.

name: stations_stationid
description: Fetch metadata about a specified weather station using the station ID.

stationid.description: The ID of the weather station.

name: find_places
description: Searches for places by name to obtain a place_id for use with Weather Forecast Endpoints and retrieves detailed geographical information (e.g., country, region, elevation, timezone) for a given location.

text.description: Name of the place to search.

language.description: Language in which the place names will be returned. Available options include:

name: air_quality_measurements
description: Fetches current air quality measurements per hour for a given city using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

country.description: The country in which the city is located.

city.description: The city for which the air quality measurements are to be fetched.

lon.description: The longitude coordinate of the city. Defaults to '4.897070'.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate of the city. Defaults to '52.377956'.

name: retrieve_the_hardiness_zone
description: Fetch the USDA Plant Hardiness Zone for the given ZIP code using the Toolbench API.

zipcode.description: The ZIP code for which to retrieve the hardiness zone.

name: products_types_typeid_locations
description: Fetches a list of locations that have issued products for a given product type.

typeid.description: The ID of a valid product type.

name: current_snow_conditions
description: Fetches the current snow conditions for a specified ski resort.

resort.description: The name of the ski resort to retrieve snow conditions for.

units.description: The unit system to use for the conditions. Accepted values are 'i' (imperial) and 'm' (metric). Defaults to 'i'.

name: classification
description: Gets the Köppen climate classification code for the given longitude and latitude coordinates.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate.

name: zones_type_zoneid
description: Fetches metadata for a specific zone using the National Weather Service API.

type.description: A valid zone type (e.g., forecast zone).

zoneid.description: The ID of the specific zone.

name: get_weather
description: Fetch weather information including current, hourly, and daily data for a specific location.

version.description: The version of the API to be used.

lat.description: Geographical coordinate of the location (latitude).

unit.description: Unit of temperature ('F' for Fahrenheit, 'C' for Celsius, or default 'K' for Kelvin). Defaults to None.

name: one_call_api
description: Fetch weather data from the One Call API for given geographical coordinates.

lat.description: Latitude of the location.

lang.description: Language for the weather data. Default is None.

units.description: Units of measurement ('standard', 'metric', 'imperial'). Default is None; 'standard' units will be applied by default.

exclude.description: Parts of the weather data to exclude from the API response, specified as a comma-delimited list. Possible values include 'current', 'minutely', 'hourly', 'daily', 'alerts'. Default is None.

name: minutely
description: Fetches minute-by-minute precipitation forecast for the next 60 minutes, updated in real-time using AI nowcasting models.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place. Used to specify the location. If not provided, use `lat` and `lon`. Defaults to None.

timezone.description: Timezone for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. Formats like 'Europe/Prague' or 'UTC' can be used, or 'auto' to use local timezone. Defaults to 'auto'.

lat.description: Latitude of the location. Specify in formats like '12N', '12.3N', '12.3', or '-13.4'. Defaults to '37.81021'.

language.description: Language for text summaries. Available languages are 'en' (default), 'es', 'fr', 'de', 'pl', 'cs'. Defaults to 'en'.

units.description: Unit system to be used. Values can be 'auto' (default), 'metric', 'us', 'uk', 'ca'. Defaults to 'auto'.

lon.description: Longitude of the location. Specify in formats like '12E', '12.3E', '12.3', or '-13.4'. Defaults to '-122.42282'.

name: alerts_active_area_area
description: Retrieves a list of active weather alerts for a specified area using the National Weather Service API. The data is returned in CAP-ATOM format.

area.description: A valid area for which to retrieve active alerts. Refer to the counts endpoint for a list of valid areas.

name: products_types_typeid
description: Returns a list of products for a given product type ID by making a request to the National Weather Service API.

typeid.description: An ID representing a valid product type.

name: points_point_forecast_hourly
description: Fetches hourly weather forecast data for a given geographical point using the RapidAPI service.

point.description: A string specifying the geographical point in the format "latitude,longitude".

name: historical_weather_record
description: Fetches historical weather records for a specified location within a given time range.

location.description: The address or latitude, longitude of the location. Addresses can be full or partial (city, state, zip code). If using coordinates, the format should be latitude,longitude (decimal degrees).

enddatetime.description: The end date and time for the data request in ISO format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss) using the location's time zone.

startdatetime.description: The start date and time for the data request in ISO format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss) using the location's time zone.

aggregatehours.description: The interval between weather history data points in the output. Supported values are 1 (hourly) or 24 (daily).

unitgroup.description: The unit system for the output data. Supported values are 'us', 'uk', or 'metric'.

contenttype.description: The format of the output data. Supported values are 'json' or 'csv'. Default is 'csv'.

dayendtime.description: Filters the output to records within the specified end time of the day (format: HH:mm:ss). Default is '17:00:00'.

daystarttime.description: Filters the output to records within the specified start time of the day (format: HH:mm:ss). Default is '08:00:00'.

shortcolumnnames.description: If True, returns shorter, abbreviated column names. If False, returns descriptive column names. Useful for programmatic use.

name: get_climate_data_by_lat_lon_or_key
description: Fetch climate data for a specific location by latitude and longitude or by city key.

lat.description: Latitude of the location. Defaults to 45.

lon.description: Longitude of the location. Defaults to -70.

key.description: City key from a list of cities. Defaults to None.

lang.description: Language of the response. Can be one of ['en', 'de', 'nl', 'fr', 'pl', 'gr', 'it', 'cn', 'ru', 'cz', 'pt', 'es']. Defaults to 'en'.

name: rapidapigetforecastsummarybylocationname
description: Fetches the weather forecast summary for a given location name using the RapidAPI Forecast service.

locationname.description: The name of the location for which to retrieve the forecast summary.
